title: WhatsApp Message Reactions are finally rolling out to all users
content:
WhatsApp is one of the most popular instant messaging (IM) apps out there. Billions of people depend on the Meta-owned service to reach businesses and their loved ones around the world. Despite its popularity, though, this app still lacks some of the rich features its rivals offer. Telegram, for example, introduces new additions more often

The post WhatsApp Message Reactions are finally rolling out to all users appeared first on XDA.
description: After a limited beta test with select users, WhatsApp is now rolling out Message Reactions to all users around the world.
